alert.note: Alert for Erie; Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 4:36PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Ohio and northwest Ohio, including the following counties, in north central Ohio, Erie. In northwest Ohio, Sandusky. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sandusky, Castalia, Bay View, Sandusky South, Fairview Lanes and Whites Landing. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
